pullRequest.title: [CDAP-16434][CDAP-16551] Replicator Manual Table Selection and Parallelism Config

commit.message: [CDAP-16434] replicator add ability to select tables and columns manually

nodes.bodyText: this seems like it is for offsetBasePath?

nit: It's a little confusing to me (and potentially prone to errors when ppl have typos) to have both OffsetBasePath and offsetBasePath - maybe this one and NumInstances could be named in a way to make it more clear that they are returning a widget/component?
why do we use props.value.size here instead of length? (same question for tablemultirow)
